_comment: Command button widget for sending RPC calls on click. Extracted from make_command_button() in setup_zenopix.py (lines 763-820). Replace ${DEVICE_ID} with actual device UUID. The valueToDataFunction returns the RPC params value.
_datasource: Target device (direct device ID). No entity alias needed. RPC is sent on button click.

onClickState._comment: EXECUTE_RPC sends a one-way RPC to the device. method is the RPC method name. valueToDataFunction returns the params sent to the device. Alternative: SET_ATTRIBUTE to write shared attributes instead (avoids 408 timeout for offline devices).

valueToData._comment: FUNCTION type uses valueToDataFunction JS body. For simple constant, use type=CONSTANT with constantValue. The function should return the RPC params.

disabledState._comment: Controls when the button is disabled. DO_NOTHING means button is always enabled. Other actions: GET_ATTRIBUTE, GET_TIME_SERIES, GET_ALARM_STATUS.

return data;
